edges.surfaceText: [[利用+する]] is a translation of [[use]]
[[役だてる]] is a translation of [[use]]
[[役立てる]] is a translation of [[use]]
[[بهره برداری کردن]] is a translation of [[use]]
[[使い果たす]] is a translation of [[use]]
[[使用+する]] is a translation of [[use]]
[[働かせる]] is a translation of [[use]]
You would [[buy products]] because you want to [[use them]]
You would [[find a lost item]] because you want to [[use it]]
You would [[repair an umbrella]] because you want to [[use it]]
[[pull out all the stops]] is a type of [[use]]
You are likely to find [[a room]] in [[use]]
[[use]] is used in the context of [[law]]
